PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing Robert R. Fowler, Ambassador and Permanent Representative of Canada to the United Nations, or Michel Duval, Deputy Permanent Representative, to sign, subject to ratification, the CONVENTION ON THE SUPPRESSION OF TERRORIST BOMBING OFFENSES.
